author: rahuls
msg: 1. JAXP spec. allows []s of String, File, InputStream, InputSource as well, apart from Object[] for the property "http://java.sun.com/xml/jaxp/properties/schemaSource". Implementation must adhere to the spec.
2. Making the exception message more descriptive.

author: sandygao
msg: 1. Shouldn't prepend "file://" to the user dir, because later on when a URI
is created, another "file://" will be prepended.
2. Avoid creating a new Sting to change "blah/blah" to "blah/blah/", now
we do it when we still have the string buffer.

author: sandygao
msg: The array for property defaults has one less entry than that of the property
names. This causes ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when the
getPropertyDefault methods is called for the JAXP schema language property.

author: sandygao
msg: Escaping non-ASCII characters that appear in the "user.dir" property.
